articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Hades II's new combat options enhance an already great game - Ars Technica
articles.description: New magic system shines in the game's early "Technical Test" period.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ New gods, same old drama.

articles.title: NASA on Alert: Scientists Gear Up for Solar Storms at Mars - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Sun will be at peak activity this year, providing a rare opportunity to study how solar storms and radiation could affect future astronauts on the Red Planet. In the months ahead, two of NASA’s Mars spacecraft will have an unprecedented opportunity to stu…
articles.content: This coronal mass ejection, captured by NASA’s Solar Dynamics Observatory, erupted on the Sun on August 31, 2012, traveling over 900 miles per second and sending radiation deep into space. Earth’s ma… [+6747 chars]
